projects.name: Ck Gatsby blog
projects.description: This is a beautiful and featureful gatsby blog starter for writers. I have built this blog starter intending to give more features with a beautiful look. I learned to build gatsby apps and a little bit graphql.
projects.technologies: Gatsby, graphql, styled-components, sass, and react icons

projects.name: InstaAds - An advertisement platform for businesses
projects.description: It is my first freelance project that is in production now. It is a collab project of two guys where I was responsible for building the Back End of this app. I have used Express and MongoDB.
projects.technologies: Express, MongoDB, React, Ant design, and styled-components

projects.name: Galaxy - Application Management System
projects.description: It is a throw back to AltCampus. We have built an Altcampus application management system. It is a project of 5 collaborators, where I mostly worked as a navigator to help in developing Back End APIs, some small dashboard features with redux implementation and fixing bugs. This app is in production now. You can take experience.
projects.technologies: Express, React, Redux and Ant design

projects.name: Top blog - Fully functional blog app for writers and readers
projects.description: Sharing knowledge by creativity has a huge impact on the community. It is the best thing one should do. I have built this app to aid people to share their knowledge with the creativity of writing skills. People can create an account and start writing and reading blogs from anywhere in the globe. By developing this app, I got the hands-on experience of building full-stack apps. It doesn’t only deliver an amazing experience but also delivers wonderful UX. I learned about some new techniques to overcome some issues.
projects.technologies: ReactJS, ExpressJs, CSS grids and styled-components etc.

projects.name: Neighborhood Map
projects.description: This is a Neighborhood map PWA app. It facilitates a user to find neighborhood places. I built this app with Google maps API and Foursquare API. It has a service worker. So, People can use this app even if the device is offline or in low internet connectivity.
projects.technologies: React, Google Maps Api, FourSquoure api and Service workers

projects.name: City Bazzar - eCommerce platform
projects.description: It is an eCommerce app. I developed this platform for people to use for their daily grocery orders in COVID-19 lock-down.
projects.technologies: React, Context API, Styled-components and Sass

projects.name: Exercise tracker API
projects.description: The exercise tracker is an API that allows a dev to perform CRUD operation without building a separate Back End from scratch. Dev needs to fork and deploy this repo. I learned to create APIs with Express, MongoDB and Mongoose.

projects.name: Flappy bird
projects.description: The flappy bird game is one of the fun game. Make a High score and break it in next play. I have tested my new-found knowledge of Object oriented JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas.

projects.name: MyReads - A book tracking app
projects.description: The book library app that facilitates a user to search and, select and categories books that have read, are currently reading or want to read. I built the functionality of this bookshelf app with react.

projects.name: Restaurant Reviews App
projects.description: This is a Restaurant Review App. This app helps us to find the nearest restaurant and see reviews. You can choose a restaurant from a given list and check reviews by clicking the view details button. Also, a map is available to get the location of the selected restaurant. I have made this site a mobile-friendly with implementing accessibility and Service worker for offline support.
projects.technologies: Mapbox API, HTML, CSS Grids, A11Y and Service Workers

projects.name: Classic Arcade Game
projects.description: An HTML5 Canvas powered video game, developed using the best practices of JavaScript Classes. Let's see how good you are at gaming.

projects.name: Github Battle Royal
projects.description: It's a funny Github battle app where a user can enter two Github usernames and click on the battle button to see the result. This is built using vanilla js, CSS and HTML.
projects.technologies: javaScript, Github APIs, HTML and CSS

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: It’s a shnazzy, well-designed, feature-packed memory game! I made it live by adding javaScript. I learned to work with DOM and Event listeners with javaScript

projects.name: Voice Notes - Now write with voice
projects.description: Tired of typing, try this new tool to boost your writing. You need to speak. I will take care to record and convert your voice into text. I have built this fantastic app for writers who are more comfortable with speaking rather than typing.

projects.name: RSS Feedreader
projects.description: Testing is an important part of the development process and many organizations practice a standard of development known as "test-driven development". I wrote the test with jasmine to learn the importance of "test-driven development".
